column3: The functional tests were disabled a while ago, so the total run time is lower\n\nConcept ACK. I did like the 10 minute speedup, but if this causes too much issues, removing seems fine for now.

> The functional tests were disabled a while ago, so the total run time is lower

Ah that explains it. I saw some test results and assumed it was still the original command.
